title: Secluded Sahara Desert Paradise with Four Restaurants, Three Bars & Pools
description: Live out your daring desert dreams right in the heart of the Sahara with a secluded stay at the palatial Anantara Sahara Tozeur Resort & Villas. Soak up breathtaking panoramic views from the privacy of your luxury villa, with a cocktail in hand at the pool bar, or while exploring the incredible Atlas Mountains by car. Feel like royalty while dining alfresco under the stars Berber style, admire the stunning Arabian architecture from the vantage point of one of the resort pools, or rejuvenate with a specialty spa treatment.
